string-array.name: daily_morning_suicide_questions
string-array.item: In the last few days, have you seriously thought about committing suicide?
Is there any possibility that you are thinking of ending your life today or in the next few days?

string-array.name: daily_night_suicide_questions
string-array.item: I have had thoughts of suicide
Today, have you seriously considered suicide?
Is there any possibility that you are thinking about ending your life today or in the next few days?

string-array.name: daily_symptoms_questions
string-array.item: Have you experienced any changes in your appetite?
What was your level of rest?
Your level of concentration has been…
What was your level of libido?
How did you feel in terms of pain?

string-array.name: one_off_stress_questions
string-array.item: In the last month, how often have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly?
In the last month, how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life?
In the last month, how often have you felt nervous and stressed?
In the last month, how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?
In the last month, how often have you felt that things were going your way?
In the last month, how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do?
In the last month, how often have you been able to control irritations in your life?
In the last month, how often have you felt that you were on top of things?
In the last month, how often have you been angered because of things that happened that were outside of your control?
In the last month, how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?

string-array.name: one_off_depression_questions
string-array.item: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Feeling bad about yourself — or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite — being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way

string-array.name: one_off_loneliness_questions
string-array.item: I feel in tune with the people around me
There is no one I can turn to
I feel part of a group of friends
I have a lot in common with the people around me
I am no longer close to anyone
My interests and ideas are not shared by those around me
There are people I feel close to
No one really knows me well
I can find companionship when I want it
There are people who really understand me
I am unhappy being so withdrawn
People are around me but not with me
There are people I can talk to
There are people I can turn to
